channel.title: Adding world portals
channel.description:
I assume this is probably a bit too much to ask, but adding world portals (like in Portal 2) would be amazing. Even though of no use in the single player campaign it would be a great feature for mappers.
In case somebody doesn't know what a world portal is: [youtube.com/watch?v=9zMITi-l10c](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9zMITi-l10c)

item.title: Adding world portals
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
These were used to great effect in Portal 2, but it seems like it is a feature for that specific branch of the engine, which I doubt the devs have actual code for.

item.title: Adding world portals
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
This actually would help with a number of maps that don’t quite fit together (I’m looking at you, c1a2c…), but I have no idea how these would play with Black Mesa’s substantially different codebase.

The effect can in many cases be faked with hidden trigger_teleports- take a look at bm_c1a4c or my upcoming pd_c1a2a for examples of this.
